item.title: Breach in the Cloud - Pwned Labs
item.description: Scenario We have been alerted to a potential security incident. The security team at Huge Logistics has provided AWS keys from an account that recorded unusual activity, along with AWS CloudTrail logs for the time of the activity. We need your expertise to confirm the breach by analyzing the CloudTrail logs, identifying the compromised AWS service, and any data that may have been exfiltrated. Is cooming. . .
